parts.text: {"word":"swim","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"泳ぐ","english_definition":"to move through water by using your arms and legs","examples":[{"sentence":"I can swim very well.","translation":"私はとても上手に泳ぐことができます。"},{"sentence":"She swims every day in the summer.","translation":"彼女は夏には毎日泳ぎます。"},{"sentence":"The children were swimming in the pool.","translation":"子供たちはプールで泳いでいました。"}],"collocations":["go swimming (泳ぎに行く)","swim across (～を泳いで渡る)","swim in (～で泳ぐ)","swim with (～と一緒に泳ぐ)"],"synonyms":["float","glide","paddle","stroke"],"antonyms":["sink"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(川・海など)を泳いで渡る","english_definition":"to cross a body of water by swimming","examples":[{"sentence":"He swam the English Channel.","translation":"彼はドーバー海峡を泳いで渡った。"},{"sentence":"She swam the river to reach the other side.","translation":"彼女は川を泳いで向こう岸にたどり着いた。"}],"collocations":["swim across a river (川を泳いで渡る)","swim the channel (海峡を泳いで渡る)"],"synonyms":["cross by swimming"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(目が)回る、ぼやける","english_definition":"to have a dizzy or blurred sensation","examples":[{"sentence":"My head is swimming.","translation":"頭がぼうっとしています。"},{"sentence":"The words on the page began to swim before my eyes.","translation":"ページの文字が目の前でぼやけ始めた。"}],"collocations":["head swims (頭がぼうっとする)","eyes swim (目がぼやける)"],"synonyms":["reel","whirl","spin","blur"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(液体の中に)浮いている、浸っている","english_definition":"to be covered or filled with liquid; to float on a liquid","examples":[{"sentence":"The vegetables were swimming in oil.","translation":"野菜は油に浸っていた。"},{"sentence":"The floor was swimming with water after the pipe burst.","translation":"パイプが破裂した後、床は水浸しになった。"}],"collocations":["swim in oil (油に浸っている)","swim in water (水に浸っている)"],"synonyms":["float","soak","immerse","bathe"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"泳ぎ、水泳","english_definition":"an act of swimming","examples":[{"sentence":"Let's go for a swim.","translation":"泳ぎに行きましょう。"},{"sentence":"I enjoy a good swim in the ocean.","translation":"私は海で気持ちよく泳ぐのが好きです。"}],"collocations":["go for a swim (泳ぎに行く)","have a swim (泳ぐ)","a quick swim (ちょっと泳ぐ)"],"synonyms":["bathing","dip"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"古英語の 'swimman' に由来し、ゲルマン祖語の '*swimmanan' を語源とする。これはさらにインド・ヨーロッパ祖語の 'swem-' (動く) に遡る。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/swɪm/","syllables":"swim"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["swim","swims"],"past_simple":"swam","past_participle":"swum","present_participle":"swimming"},"noun_plural":"swims (rarely used)"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Swim' は基本的な動詞で、人や動物が水中で腕や脚を使って進む動作を表します。名詞としては、その行為自体を指します。比喩的な意味合いとしては、目が回る、液体に浸っている、などの意味があります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I swimmed yesterday.","correct":"✓ I swam yesterday.","note":"'Swim' の過去形は 'swam' です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ I have swam already.","correct":"✓ I have swum already.","note":"'Swim' の過去分詞は 'swum' です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ I like to swimming.","correct":"✓ I like to swim. / ✓ I like swimming.","note":"'Like' の後には to 不定詞または動名詞が続きます。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["swimmer (名詞: 泳ぐ人)","swimming (名詞: 水泳; 形容詞: 水泳の)","swimmingly (副詞: スムーズに、楽々と)"],"phrasal_verbs":["swim against the tide (流れに逆らう)","swim with the tide (流れに乗る)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"A1","frequency_google_ngram":"非常に高頻度 (Very high frequency) - 英語のコア語彙の一つ。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"A1","text":"'Swim' は「およぐ」という意味の基本的な単語です。プールや海で人が体を動かして水の中を進むことを言います。例えば、「I can swim. (私は泳げます。)」のように使います。名詞としては、「泳ぎに行く」という意味で "go for a swim" のように使われます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"She is learning to **swim**.","translation":"彼女は泳ぎを習っています。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"泳ぐ"},{"sentence":"They **swam** across the lake.","translation":"彼らは湖を泳いで渡った。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"泳いで渡る"},{"sentence":"After the accident, everything seemed to **swim** before his eyes.","translation":"事故の後、彼の目の前ではすべてが回っているように見えた。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"(目が)回る"},{"sentence":"The dumplings were **swimming** in soy sauce.","translation":"餃子は醤油に浸っていた。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"(液体の中に)浮いている"},{"sentence":"We went for a **swim** in the ocean.","translation":"私たちは海に泳ぎに行った。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"泳ぎ"}]}
